entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
